item.title: Apple Secures Half of TSMC's 2nm Production Capacity for iPhone 18
item.description: Apple has ordered almost half of TSMC’s initial 2nm production capacity for the iPhone 18 as the pure foundry begins mass production of its next-generation chip process. According to DigiTimes, TSMC’s

item.title: Apple Secures Half of TSMC's 2nm Production Capacity for iPhone 18

item.title: Trump says US will take 10% stake in Intel because CEO wants to “keep his job”
item.description: Intel deal could pave the way for the US to profit off CHIPS Act funding.

item.title: Trump confirms US is seeking 10% stake in Intel. Bernie Sanders approves.
item.description: Trump vowed to kill CHIPS Act. Instead, he’s found a way to salvage it.

item.title: Employees Arrested Over Alleged Theft of Chip Tech for Apple A20 Chip
item.description: Several current and former TSMC employees have been accused of stealing proprietary information related to the company’s 2-nanometer chip process, which is expected to debut in Apple’s A20 chip for th
